metadata.synopsis: When a player attempts to enter the Shadowfell they will be reminded that they need to have all their party members present.If all their party are present a Ready Check will be started
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on the entrance to the Shadowfell

0.speaker: Narrator
0.text: *You must gather your party before venturing forth.*

1.speaker: Narrator
1.text: *Your party is gathered. You are ready - or so you hope.*
